00061 #endif //EXPERIMENTAL_RULER_AUTOSIZE
00062  
00063    // This just returns a constant and can be overriden by subclasses
00064    // to specify a different height for the case that the track is minimized.
00065    virtual int GetMinimizedHeight() const;
00066  
00067    int GetHeight() const;
00068    void SetHeight( int h ) { mHeight = h; }

00083

00088    };
00089 
00090    enum {
00091       None,

00095 #endif

00098    } TrackKindEnum;

00109    // take on some paramaters of its partner.

00123    void SetSelected(bool s) { mSelected = s; }
00124    void SetMute    (bool m) { mMute     = m; }
00125    void SetLinked  (bool l) { mLinked   = l; mTeamed = l; }
00126    void SetTeamed  (bool l) { mTeamed   = l; mLinked = false; }
00127    void SetSolo    (bool s) { mSolo     = s; }

00131

00137    // AS: Note that the dirManager is mutable.  This is
00138    // mostly to support "Duplicate" of const objects,
00139    // but in general, mucking with the dir manager is

00280 class AUDACITY_DLL_API ConstTrackListIterator {
00281  public:
00282     ConstTrackListIterator(const TrackList * val) : l(val), cur(NULL) {}
00283 
00284     // Iterate functions
00285     Track *First() const
00286     {
00287        cur = l->head;
00288 
00289        if (cur) return cur->t;
00290        return NULL;
00291     }
00292 
00293     Track *Next() const
00294     {
00295        if (cur) cur = cur->next;
00296        if (cur) return cur->t;
00297        return NULL;
00298     }
00299 
00300  private:
00301     const TrackList * l;
00310     mutable TrackListNode *cur;
00311 };
